meanings.definition: The state or quality of being rambunctious.
meanings.sent1: The rambunctiousnesses of the children at the party was hard to control.
meanings.sent2: Her rambunctiousnesses often led to laughter and chaos in the classroom.
meanings.sent3: The rambunctiousnesses of the puppy made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The rambunctiousnesses of the storm could be felt in the howling winds.
meanings.sent5: The rambunctiousnesses of the waves crashing against the shore was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The behavior or actions of being unruly or boisterous.
meanings.sent1: The teacher had to calm down the rambunctiousnesses in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The rambunctiousnesses of the fans at the concert added to the excitement.
meanings.sent3: The rambunctiousnesses of the squirrel stealing nuts was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The rambunctiousnesses of the market traders could be heard from afar.
meanings.sent5: The rambunctiousnesses of the thunderstorm shook the entire town.
